entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: plaintext #48658
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps #48657
  • SPA Proxy Development Server doesn't auto refresh on .NET Core 6.0 & angular 13 #48651
  • [SSR] Route parameter not working with page directive #48649

Closed

  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudDeleteProduct #48622
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef, single_query #48621
  • Perf regression: plaintext #48645
  • ASP.NET Identity cookie value set to blank. #48529
  • PasswordValidator - why does IsUpper and IsLower methods checks only latin characters #48583
  • Bug with specific word in [Authorize] Policy Attribute #48586
  • Is the Blazor web app (United) model still as easy to develop as blazor? Will the interaction between onlick and js still be as easy as it was in blazor? #48633
  • Mvc.Api.Analyzers.ApiConventionAnalyzer throws ArgumentNullException when action doesn't return #48528
    .NET 8 Planning
  • RZ10012 warning and MSBuild 17.6 #48281
  • Blazor Server DelegateHandler does not receive correct (circuit-)scoped service instance #48601
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, json #48636

PullRequests

Created

  • Support IHttpSysRequestInfoFeature and IHttpSysRequestTimingFeature in IIS in proc server #48663
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • feat: Add StringSyntaxAttribute for guid and timespan args #48662
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • [Blazor] Recursive binding and removing prefix allocations #48654
    area-blazor
  • Switch to bootstrap icons #48652
    area-blazor
  • Add diagnostics exception handling metrics #48648
    blocked, area-middleware
  • Add links to video for contribution guidelines #48647
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution

Merged

  • Do not publish wixpacks when postbuild sign is not true #48661
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview6
  • Update selenium #48659
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview6
  • Handle methods that never return in Api Analyzers #48623
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 8.0-preview6
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `797b0ad` to `04cf298` #48561
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.19
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `042dd9c` to `1d1834b` #48562
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.19
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `797b0ad` to `04cf298` #48563
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.8
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `d5cae28` to `68cd408` #48564
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.8
  • Update Milstones for July servicing #48660
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview6
  • Update branding to 6.0.19 #48643
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.19
  • Update branding to 7.0.8 #48644
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.8
  • Add missing space to error message #48653
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview6
  • Expose SNI hostname in ITlsHandshakeFeature for Kestrel/HttpSys #48572
    community-contribution, blog-candidate, area-networking, 8.0-preview6
  • [Blazor] SupplyParameterFromForm complex type support. #48567
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview6
  • Update SDK to 8.0.100-preview.6.23305.3 #48619
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview6
  • [Blazor] SupplyParameterFromForm dictionary support #48565
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview6
  • [Blazor] SupplyParameterFromForm primitive collections #48559
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview6
  • [Blazor] Support for primitive types in [SupplyParameterFromForm] #48432
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview6
  • Minor debugging visualizer cleanup #48632
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview6

Updated

  • Add dependency injection support for object pools #48217
    area-runtime
  • Send CloseMessage from client to server #48577
    area-signalr
  • Use ArgumentException.ThrowIfNullOrWhitespace #48414
    community-contribution, area-networking, area-middleware
  • add review comment to sb files #48566
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] Don't run publish-specific Mvc.Testing tasks if project is not publishable #48364
    area-mvc, feature-mvc-testing, pending-ci-rerun, 6.0.x
  • Updated the AddPolicyRegistry extension methods to use TryAdd and TryAddEnumerable internally #47821
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Update RDG to use interceptors feature #48555
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • [Blazor] SupplyFromFormParameter support nested complex object bindings #48570
    area-blazor
  • Add routing metrics #48637
    blocked, area-middleware
  • RDF test migration for some response test cases. #48611
    area-minimal
